Text:
Thank you! Subtitles work well in VLC player, free download here:
http://www.videolan.org/vlc/
Sound is mono due to DTS audio track on DVD, see comment on http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6063812/Farewell.2009.FRENCH.NORDiC.PAL.DVDR-TV2LAX9

Have edited English subtitles which were compiled for the SLiM release (the best English translation by far) so that the timing matches this release.... non-English spoken parts only.

http://subscene.com/english/Farewell-LAffaire-Farewell/subtitle-455693.aspx
